multiformat

Class Rational

  • java.lang.Object
    • multiformat.Rational

  • public class Rational
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a rational ('breuk').
    Author:
    J.Baljé: Added comments

    • Method Detail

      • canonical

        public void canonical()
        Get rid of any decimals in the numerator. E.g. 12.5/1.0 becomes 125.0/10.0 (Note that any decimals in the denominator aren't handled, eg 10/0.5. This seems an omission.) Seen also unittest TestRational.java

      • simplify

        public void simplify()
        Simplify the rational. 125/10 becomes 25/2. Seen also unittest TestRational.java

      • plus

        public Rational plus(Rational other)
        Add two rationals
        Parameters:
        other - Another Rational to add to this.
        Returns:
        A new Rational representing the sum.
